question.text: You are waiting at a level crossing. A train has passed but the lights keep flashing. You must

explanation.text: If the lights at a level crossing continue to flash after a train has passed, you should still wait as there might be another train coming. Time seems to pass slowly when you’re held up in a queue. Be patient and wait until the lights stop flashing.

answer.text: edge over the stop line and look for trains
